name: Spin Attack Simulator
description:
You can only deal damage by spinning (left click)

Kill 3 bosses with various and random gears

Move with WASD

LEFT MOUSE CLICK TO SPIN

Created in KNU game creation club Revolution

Game Design... 김민종

Programming... 강은영, 김석일

Graphic Design...  석지향, 황은지
